data.title: Pentair on LinkedIn: Strong Results that Exceeded Expectations
data.meta_description: Pentair today reported strong first quarter 2024 results, reiterated the Company’s full year adjusted EPS outlook and introduced strong Q2 guidance. “We…

With 14.19 billion USD in revenue, growing at 11.42 %, with net profit margin of 7.69 % for 2022, Ecolab's intrinsic worth is 51 billion USD, compared with Ecolab's current market capitalization of 63.07 billion USD. Are you still manually copying large data sets to calculate PCF? Benn Heatley encourages you to re-think your approach and understand your “why”! He discusses the mind shift Afton Chemical has taken to share PCF data more efficiently and drive alignment on joint sustainability goals. Watch the full webinar here: https://lnkd.in/gu8Cicec
